src:
Man of the Match Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus: Aleksei Miranchuk
07 Nov 2019, 03:53 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juventus kembali menuai kemenangan dalam laga lanjutan fase grup Liga Champions yang digelar pada Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari. Melawan Lokomotiv Moscow, skuat besutan Massimiliano Allegri itu menang dengan skor tipis 2-1.
Skor imbang 1-1 sempat bertahan cukup lama. Awalnya, Juventus unggul lebih dulu melalui gol Aaron Ramsey di menit ke-3. Namun keunggulan tersebut tak bertahan lama karena Aleksey Miranchuk mencetak gol balasan pada menit ke-12.
Kemenangan klub berjuluk Bianconeri tersebut baru bisa didapatkan pada masa injury time. Douglas Costa, yang masuk pada babak kedua, melakukan solo run dengan sedikit bantuan dari Gonzalo Higuain dan berhasil menjebol gawang Guilherme. Juventus menang 2-1.
Kemenangan tersebut membuat Juventus berhasil mendapatkan tiket untuk melaju ke babak berikutnya. Sementara itu, Lokomotiv Moscow harus puas bertengger di peringkat tiga dengan raihan tiga poin saja.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Man of the Match Lokomotiv Moscow vs Juventus: Aleksei Miranchuk
Nov 7 2019, 03:53 by Bola.net
Soccer - Juventus reap the victory in the match continued phase of the Champions League group stage which was held on Thursday (11/07/2019) morning. Against Lokomotiv Moscow, Massimiliano Allegri's squad won with a narrow score of 2-1.
A 1-1 draw could last long enough. Initially, Juventus took the lead through Aaron Ramsey's goal in the 3rd minute. But these advantages did not last long because Aleksey Miranchuk scored a goal back in the 12th minute.
The victory of the club nicknamed the Bianconeri can only be obtained during injury time. Douglas Costa, who entered the second half, did a solo run with a little help from Gonzalo Higuain and managed to break down Guilherme's goal. Juventus wins 2-1.
The victory made Juventus managed to get a ticket to advance to the next round. Meanwhile, Lokomotiv Moscow had to settle for ranked third with only three points.
